name: Zeze Against Antibiotics: A Soil Bacterium's Quest
name_original: Zeze Against Antibiotics: A Soil Bacterium's Quest
description:
This is an interactive story and game about how bacteria acquire antibiotic resistance genes. But it is also a story about dreams, challenges, sacrifice, and change.

This is the unedited version.

Each scene has soundtrack and sound effects. Right now, this works best with mobile devices.  (though volume is problematic)

It can still be viewed and played on desktop but some scenes does not start/continue the music after upload.

For now, I hope it would still be an enjoyable journey
